Title: [L-02] The `ecrecover` precompile is vulnerable to signature malleability
Content: By flipping `s` and `v` it is possible to create a different signature that will amount to the same hash & signer. This is fixed in OpenZeppelin's ECDSA library like [this](https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts/blob/dfef6a68ee18dbd2e1f5a099061a3b8a0e404485/contracts/utils/cryptography/ECDSA.sol#L125-L136). While this is not a problem since there is the `canceledOrFilled` mapping, it is still highly recommended that problem is addressed by using ECDSA.
